name: The Exorcist: Legion VR - Chapter 1: First Rites
description: The Exorcist: Legion VR is an episodic VR experience set in the academy-award winning world created by horror maestro William Peter Blatty. Each chapter features a unique demonic entity that will test your courage and resolve. Available for HTC Vive and Oculus Rift. Not for the faint-hearted.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 - 64 bit Processor: Intel Core i5 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports,  roomscale volume on the HTC Vive, Oculus Touch supported
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports,  roomscale volume on the HTC Vive, Oculus Touch supported
